name: Sweet Princess Prom Night
summary: The most spectacular event of the year has arrived. Yes, the prom! Tonight, princesses and princes from all over the world will join it. Our girls are no exception. Now, they're so nervous and busy making themselves look their best. Spa, makeup, dress up, doing nails... They just don’t know what to do first. Little stylist, go help them and make these sweethearts into prom stunners!
